result.reason: The issue has clear reproduction details and maps directly to existing custom activation/refocus handling where a taskbar focus edge case is plausible.
result.approach: Gate/refine WM_ACTIVATEAPP and foreground-focus calls so mRemoteNG does not steal or confuse taskbar window activation, then regression-test PuTTY and RDP focus behavior.
